recipes.title: Vegan Lentil Soup
steps: Rinse the lentils and place them in a large pot with the chopped carrots, celery, onion, garlic, vegetable broth, cumin, coriander, salt, and pepper.
Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and let simmer for 30-40 minutes, until the lentils are tender.
Remove from heat and let cool for a few minutes.
Use an immersion blender to blend the soup until it is smooth and creamy.
If the soup is too thick, add more vegetable broth or water to thin it out.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Lasagna
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
In a large bowl, combine ricotta cheese, chopped spinach, minced garlic, salt, and pepper.
Spread a thin layer of marinara sauce in the bottom of a baking dish.
Add a layer of cooked lasagna noodles on top of the sauce.
Spread a layer of the ricotta-spinach mixture on top of the lasagna noodles, followed by a layer of shredded mozzarella cheese.
Repeat layers until all ingredients are used up, ending with a layer of mozzarella cheese on top.
Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.
Remove the foil and continue baking for an additional 10-15 minutes, until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Remove from oven and let cool for a few minutes before serving.

recipes.title: Oven-Roasted Vegetables
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F.
In a large bowl, toss the sliced carrots, diced potatoes, diced sweet potatoes, sliced red onion, minced garlic, olive oil, salt, and pepper until well coated.
Spread the vegetables out in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Roast in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender and golden brown.
Remove from oven and serve immediately.
